title: Untitled
text:
The European Space Agency is paying $5,000 for men to lie flat on waterbeds for 10 days to study zero-gravity effects. The experiment takes place in France and simulates space by suspending bodies in warm water without letting them stand.

Participants eat, bathe, and use the bathroom while horizontal, with no visitors allowed. The study aims to improve care for astronauts, seniors, and bedridden patients by examining how weightlessness affects muscles, bones, fluids, and vision.
